languages.text: "Мне жаль видеть разлад в рядах кланов Четвертого Складочного. Но я согласен с Лорд-капитаном и роспуска блюстителей требовать не буду".
"I don't like seeing the clans of Depot 4 at odds with each other. But I agree with the Lord Captain — I won't demand the disbanding of the enforcers."
languages.original_text: "Мне жаль видеть разлад в рядах кланов Четвертого Складочного. Но я согласен с Лорд-капитаном и роспуска блюстителей требовать не буду".

traits.locale_text: "I don't like seeing the clans of Depot 4 at odds with each other. But I agree with the Lord Captain — I won't demand the disbanding of the guard."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

traits.locale_text: "I don't like seeing the clans of Depot 4 at odds with each other. But I agree with the Lord Captain — I won't demand the disbanding of the guard."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

traits.locale_text: "I don't like seeing the clans of Depot 4 at odds with each other. But I agree with the Lord Captain — I won't demand the disbanding of the guard."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

traits.locale_text: "I don't like seeing the clans of Depot 4 at odds with each other. But I agree with the Lord Captain — I won't demand the disbanding of the enforcers."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: “我不希望看到四号货栈的氏族发生冲突，但我同意舰长大人的意见。我不会要求解散执法者。”
languages.original_text: "I don't like seeing the clans of Depot 4 at odds with each other. But I agree with the Lord Captain — I won't demand the disbanding of the enforcers."

traits.locale_text: “我不希望看到四号货栈的氏族发生冲突，但我同意舰长大人的意见。我不会要求解散镇压者。”
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: «No me gusta ver a los clanes del depósito 4 discutir, pero estoy de acuerdo con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán: no voy a pedir la desaparición de los guardias».
languages.original_text: "I don't like seeing the clans of Depot 4 at odds with each other. But I agree with the Lord Captain — I won't demand the disbanding of the enforcers."

traits.locale_text: «No me gusta ver a los clanes del depósito 4 discutir, pero estoy de acuerdo con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán: no voy a pedir la desaparición de los guardias».
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: 「第四倉庫の一族が対立しているのは見たくはない。だが、俺はロード・キャプテンに同意する…俺は、エンフォーサーの解散は要求しない」
languages.original_text: "I don't like seeing the clans of Depot 4 at odds with each other. But I agree with the Lord Captain — I won't demand the disbanding of the enforcers."

traits.locale_text: 「第四倉庫の一族が対立しているのは見たくはない。だが、俺はロード・キャプテンに同意する…俺は、エンフォーサーの解散は要求しない」
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: "Mir gefällt es gar nicht, wenn die Clans von Depot 4 im Clinch miteinander liegen. Aber ich stimme dem Lord Captain zu — ich werde nicht auf der Auflösung der Enforcers beharren."
languages.original_text: "I don't like seeing the clans of Depot 4 at odds with each other. But I agree with the Lord Captain — I won't demand the disbanding of the enforcers."

traits.locale_text: "Mir gefällt es gar nicht, wenn die Clans von Depot 4 im Clinch miteinander liegen. Aber ich stimme dem Lord Captain zu — ich werde nicht auf der Auflösung der Enforcers beharren."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: « Ça me chagrine de voir que les clans du dépôt 4 sont en désaccord, mais {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a raison, on a besoin du service d'ordre des prévôts. »
languages.original_text: "I don't like seeing the clans of Depot 4 at odds with each other. But I agree with the Lord Captain — I won't demand the disbanding of the enforcers."

traits.locale_text: « Ça me chagrine de voir que les clans du dépôt 4 sont en désaccord, mais {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a raison, on a besoin du service d'ordre des prévôts. »
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: "4. Depo klanlarının araları açılsın istemem. Fakat Lord Kaptan'la aynı fikirdeyim, infazcıların terhisini talep etmeyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "I don't like seeing the clans of Depot 4 at odds with each other. But I agree with the Lord Captain — I won't demand the disbanding of the enforcers."

traits.locale_text: "Depo 4 klanlarının araları açılsın istemem. Fakat Lord Kaptan'la aynı fikirdeyim, infazcıların terhisini talep etmeyeceğim."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong
